title: Robotics Teacher Training: LBD-Based Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Math-integrated robotics training program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mathematical principles (geometry, algorithms) of robot programming
Learners can create robotics education design documents using the LBD framework
Learners can complete open-ended tasks by applying collaborative problem-solving strategies in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
